personalDetail.about: Experienced software engineer with a background in backend development using Python. Skilled in Django and Flask, with expertise in React.js using both JavaScript and TypeScript. Known for a fast learning ability and continuous exploration of new technologies and best practices to deliver high-quality software solutions.
personalDetail.title: Software Engineer

experiences.title: Software Backend Engineer
bulletPoints: Developed and maintained a robust Python Django backend, managing API endpoints and integrating AWS Lambda microservices for enhanced scalability and performance.
Optimized task scheduling and asynchronous processing by integrating the Celery framework and utilized AWS SQS for efficient messaging between application components.
Contributed to system architecture and technical decision-making, identifying and resolving performance bottlenecks to ensure a smooth user experience during high-demand events.

experiences.title: Founding Software Engineer
bulletPoints: Designed and implemented multi-vendor e-commerce and inventory management API services with Django REST Framework integrated relational databases using Python.
Architected and developed core backend systems using Django, employing regression testing and pair programming methodologies to ensure high-quality, maintainable code.
Led the deployment strategy, proficiently deploying staging and production versions to AWS EC2. Applied GitHub Actions and automated CI/CD pipelines to streamline processes.

experiences.title: Data Analyst Intern
bulletPoints: Efficiently processed and manipulated data using Alteryx and Microsoft Excel, ensuring accuracy and streamlined workflows.
Collaborated closely with cross-functional teams and proactively developed the skills necessary to thrive in a diverse workplace.

education.degree: Associate of Applied Science in Software Development
BA, Labor Economics and Industrial Relations
